title: The Pink Opaque
description: Tara and Isabel met at sleepaway camp and discovered they had an ancient psychic connection. Now they help each other fight the forces of evil. They are… The Pink Opaque.
quote: I don’t even have my learner’s permit yet. How can I have a destiny?
altHero: two teen girls sit on a dock by a lake in the evening; a moon with a face is in the sky
alt1: Isabel, a teen with curly hair, walks down a football field wearing a prom dress and carrying an axe
alt2: Tara and Isabel looking down with their heads touching, pink ghost marks glow on their necks
alt3: two creepy people dressed all in white dance in the woods
alt4: a creepy ice cream man leans forward, his ice cream face melting
